WebGL EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic Extension Specification

Name

EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic

Contact

WebGL working group (public_webgl 'at' khronos.org)

Contributors

Members of the WebGL working group

Florian Bösch (pyalot 'at' gmail.com)

Version

Last modified date: July 19, 2012
Revision: 3

Number

WebGL extension #11

Dependencies

Written against the WebGL API 1.0 specification.

Overview

This extension exposes the EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic functionality to WebGL.

There are no WebGL-specific behavioral changes.

Consult the above extension for documentation, issues and new functions and enumerants.

When this extension is enabled:

  • The getTexParameter, texParameterf and texParameteri entry points' parameter pname accepts the value TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT
  • The getParameter entry point parameter pname accepts the value MAX_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, returning a value of type float.

IDL

interface EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic {
  const GLenum TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT       = 0x84FE;
  const GLenum MAX_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT   = 0x84FF;
};
